author: Hanuko33
long_description:
Based of Minetest Classic.
Intends to make a simple game, that is similar to the minecraft golden age (Alpha/Beta).

UNMAINTAINED, DROPPED.

After playing a bit of luanti with MTG, Mineclonia, VoxeLibre (or just on servers), I've realized that I shouldn't recreate minecraft. Minecraft should recreate luanti.
I highly recommend anyone to just do a deepdive into how luanti really is, not just play minecraft with different physics and texturepack.

MTG already is golden age improved, but IMPROVED (in caps).

I'll shift my focus to my other projects (non-luanti ones), or to making mods. Why should I recreate (or copy) things that already exist, when I can just make mods with the things I'm craving? Why should I waste my precious time to recreate a suboptimal experience? Why should bother making something worse, trying to recreate something worse?

Why Should I Recreate Minecraft,
																when better things exist?
name: libre_adventure3
short_description: Minecraft golden age clone with improvements
